EmailTemplate.name: RE: Welcome to MBO Access! - One last step before we can activate account! (1363
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Welcome to MBO Access! - One last step before we can activate account! (1363620587.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Bing, I hope you had a good weekend. Please log into MBO Access and complete your profile so I can activate your account and you can start billing your client. Your username for MBO Access will be the same as your MBO Business Center, and the very first time you login, you will need to click “Forgot your password,” to generate a password for you.Click here to login to MBO Access today! <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://access.mbopartners.com/login.jspa?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVhXsmd%2F%2F%2FHKbKrikl%2BqEPLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Thanks!Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Sara Conde Sent: Friday, March 15, 2013 12:01 PM To: bing@itm3.com Cc: Emily Stringer Subject: RE: Welcome to MBO Access! - One last step before we can activate account! Importance: High Hi Bing, I just wanted to follow up on my voicemail. We are so close to activating your account the last thing we need so for you to log in and complete your MBO Access profile. This is important because we need to gather data about the work you are doing for our workers compensation coverage. Of course, there are many perks as well but that’s the reason we need it completed before activating you. Please give me a ring if you have any questions, Best, Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Sara Conde Sent: Thursday, March 14, 2013 4:13 PM To: bing@itm3.com <mailto:bing@itm3.com> Subject: Welcome to MBO Access! Importance: High Dear Bing,You’re one step away from being officially enrolled with MBO Partners! As part of your registration process with us, we’d like to invite you to become part of an exclusive, invitation-only, online community comprised of our vast network of Independent Consultants, just like you. Welcome to MBO Access!
With MBO Access you will be able to: - Network – Connect with fellow MBO Associates who share similar skills, great networks, and industry expertise that may lead to new business opportunities for you. - Discover – Access information about the many organizations that are already using MBO Partners to engage their Independent Contractors and other small services providers. - Share – Post projects to the community to help other Associates learn about new opportunities or simply post your availability to determine if anyone has an interest in learning more about what you do. Share articles that interest you, and start discussions with other Associates. - Thrive – Take advantage of the exclusive arrangements we’ve negotiated with organizations that provide services to Independent Consultants and small businesses. These include discounts on business development tools, professional development skills training programs, office supplies, co-working facilities, and travel, just to name a few. So, on to the good stuff…let’s get you set up! Please view this 3 minute video tutorial <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/spages/acctutorial/acctutorial.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVhXsmd%2F%2F%2FHKbKrikl%2BqEPLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> to help you get started. Then, log into your account, click on your name in the upper right hand corner of the page, and build up your profile so others can find and connect with you. Upon completion of your profile, please find and connect with me - you will then be officially enrolled with us!Your username for MBO Access will be the same as your MBO Business Center, and the very first time you login, you will need to click “Forgot your password,” to generate a password for you.Click here to login to MBO Access today! <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://access.mbopartners.com/login.jspa?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVhXsmd%2F%2F%2FHKbKrikl%2BqEPLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>I look forward to discussing the site with you, and welcome any feedback. Best Regards,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVhXsmd%2F%2F%2FHKbKrikl%2BqEPLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVhXsmd%2F%2F%2FHKbKrikl%2BqEPLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVhXsmd%2F%2F%2FHKbKrikl%2BqEPLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCeVhXsmd%2F%2F%2FHKbKrikl%2BqEPLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
